page.title: Your Profile
page.description: Manage your account information and security settings

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your password and security preferences

password_reset.title: Password Reset
password_reset.description: You'll receive an email with a link to reset your password.
password_reset.check: Check your email for the password reset link.

tips.title: Account Security Tips
tips.1: Use a strong, unique password for your account
tips.3: Never share your password or security details with others

success.title: Password reset email sent
success.description: Check your email for the password reset link.

error.title: Password reset failed
error.description: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
